question: Question_08_(c)
statement:
Use the \textbf{first three terms} of the series in
\href{Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH103/April_2005/Question_08_(a)}{part
(a)} to find a numerical approximation of the integral shown below:

\[\displaystyle \int_{0}^{1}e^{-x^{2}}\,dx\]

Leave the answer in terms of fractions rather than decimals.
